activities:
Harlan Laboratories, Inc. (HLI) is a privately held global organization engaged in commercial physical and biological research, life sciences, custom antibody production services and laboratory animal diets and bedding.  In the course of doing business, HLI may collect and process data for business reasons such as accounts payable/receivable, marketing, financial, product support, sales and contractual requirements.     HLI may transfer data between members of the European Union and the United States.
Additionally, HLI collects employee personal information for human resource management such as payroll administration, filling employment positions, benefits, and other human resource programs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line manually and electronically processed data, human resources; In line data in an ERP system
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
